user_profile.display_name: Jabelic スクラムマスター
user_profile.name: a2239hm

text:
> 
> :zap:️ ERROR: Failed to produce a Cloudflare Pages build from the project.
> :zap:️
> :zap:️ 	The following routes were not configured to run with the Edge Runtime:
> :zap:️ 	  - /index
> :zap:️ 	  - /productDetails/[productId]
> :zap:️
> :zap:️ 	Please make sure that all your non-static routes export the following edge runtime route segment config:
> :zap:️ 	  export const runtime = ‘edge’;
> :zap:️
> :zap:️ 	You can read more about the Edge Runtime on the Next.js documentation:
> :zap:️ 	  <https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/rendering/edge-and-nodejs-runtimes>
そっかー

elements.text: ️ ERROR: Failed to produce a Cloudflare Pages build from the project.
️ 	The following routes were not configured to run with the Edge Runtime:
️ 	  - /index
️ 	  - /productDetails/[productId]
️ 	Please make sure that all your non-static routes export the following edge runtime route segment config:
️ 	  export const runtime = ‘edge’;
️ 	You can read more about the Edge Runtime on the Next.js documentation:
そっかー

text:
今開発用のものをFEとBE両方手元で動かしてみまして、商品追加のPOSTリクエスト、request headers内でBearerが見つからず...:bow:
tokenの値、仮で送ってもらってると思うんですがこの値であっていますか?

<https://github.com/chubachi-pt-2023/atomono-front/blob/development/src/infra/repository/getProductsForAddUserProduct.ts#L16>

text:
あ、すみません商品追加はこっちですね :pray:
商品追加の際、今request bodyで uid 入っていますか?
<https://github.com/chubachi-pt-2023/atomono-front/blob/development/src/infra/repository/userProduct.ts#L19>

外部設計ですべて request headers の Authorization で
uid 送信する形になったような気がしたんですがこの辺り反映されていますでしょうか?
